metadata.title: CVE-2021-39636 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In do_ipt_get_ctl and do_ipt_set_ctl of ip_tables.c, there is a possibleway to leak kernel information due to uninitialized data. This could leadto local information disclosure with system execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-120612905References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
